title: Returning from ALT+TAB takes 3-4 seconds after 7.1
body: Before the patch it loaded instantly but now it takes a while to reload. Would there be any way to fix this without using windowed mode?

replies.body: The patch shouldn't have changed the way your computer handles multitasking. Can you test this with other fullscreen applications (preferably games that require DirectX) to verify that this only happens in League?
